docs.lead_paragraph: Investigators say a 14-year-old Houston-area boy has been charged in the death of his pregnant mother at their home.

headline.main: Boy, 14, Charged in Death of His Pregnant Mom in La Marque

docs.lead_paragraph: Subscription snack and food box businesses are popping up everywhere, hoping to cash in on America’s appetite for novelty, convenience and munchies.

headline.main: With Subscription Snacks, Entrepreneurs Think Inside the Box

docs.abstract: Snack and food box subscription companies are burgeoning, aiming to profit off consumers' love of convenience and interest in trying new foods; food businesses see ventures as inexpensive way to get quick feedback on products; data gathered is valuable.
docs.snippet: Subscription snack and food box businesses are popping up everywhere, hoping to cash in on America’s appetite for novelty, convenience and munchies.

docs.lead_paragraph: In her first campaign swing since last week’s event, she seemed intent on replicating her demeanor and showing how she has improved as a candidate.

headline.main: Carly Fiorina Builds Off Successful G.O.P. Debate
headline.print_headline: Alone on the Stage, Fiorina Is Keeping Up Her Debate Approach

docs.abstract: Carly Fiorina is attempting to replicate her successful demeanor in second Republican presidential debate as she begins her first campaign swing since then, loading speeches with policy proposals and maintaining steady, forceful diction.
docs.snippet: In her first campaign swing since last week’s event, she seemed intent on replicating her demeanor and showing how she has improved as a candidate.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date said she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy and kept him alive with the help of medical staff until the ship reached port.

headline.main: Tiny, Premature Baby Survives Birth on a Cruise Ship
headline.print_headline: Tiny, Premature Baby Survives Birth on a Cruise Ship

docs.snippet: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date said she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy and kept him alive with the help of medical staff until the ship reached port.

headline.main: With Ultrasound as Backdrop, Carly Fiorina Presses Attack on Planned Parenthood

docs.abstract: In visiting a Christian pregnancy center, where she chatted with a woman having an ultrasound, Carly Fiorina was taking aim at Planned Parenthood, a favorite target of Republicans.
docs.snippet: In visiting a Christian pregnancy center, where she chatted with a woman having an ultrasound, Carly Fiorina was taking aim at Planned Parenthood, a favorite target of Republicans.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date says she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy with the help of medical staff in a desperate effort to keep him alive until the ship reached port.

headline.main: 1 1/2-Pound Baby Born on Cruise Ship Beats Odds to Survive
headline.print_headline: 1 1/2-Pound Baby Born on Cruise Ship Beats Odds to Survive

docs.snippet: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date says she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy with the help of medical staff in a desperate effort to keep him alive until the ship reached port.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date says she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy and, with the help of medical staff, managed to keep him alive until the ship reached port.

headline.main: 1 1/2-Pound Baby Born on Cruise Ship Beats Odds to Survive
headline.print_headline: 1 1/2-Pound Baby Born on Cruise Ship Beats Odds to Survive

docs.snippet: A Utah woman who unexpectedly gave birth on a cruise ship months before her due date says she wrapped towels around the 1 1/2-pound boy and, with the help of medical staff, managed to keep him alive until the ship reached port.

docs.lead_paragraph: A 13-year-old birth control implant came under new scrutiny Thursday as federal health experts discussed a host of problems reported by women implanted with the metallic device, including chronic pain, bleeding and fatigue.

headline.main: Experts Question Safety of Essure Device Linked to Pain
headline.print_headline: Experts Question Safety of Essure Device Linked to Pain

docs.snippet: A 13-year-old birth control implant came under new scrutiny Thursday as federal health experts discussed a host of problems reported by women implanted with the metallic device, including chronic pain, bleeding and fatigue.
